abilities.name: Lightning Tendrils
about: While encounter channels this skill, it releases pulses of electrical energy, dealing lightning damage in a semicircular area in front of encounter

abilities.name: Summon Eggs
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter

abilities.name: Mortar Projectile
about: Fires projectile that does damage on impact and when the projectile explodes

abilities.name: Single Area Laser
about: Creates 2 perpendicular beams that cross each other at player location

abilities.name: Multi Map Laser
about: Creates 12 perpendicular beams that cross each other at player location

abilities.name: Web
about: Pulls existing or newly created orbs back to the encounter damaging anything in it's path
